I am a Ph.D. candidate in the Department of Climate, Meteorology, and Atmospheric Sciences at the University of Illinois Urbana-Champaign. My advisor is Professor Ryan Sriver.
My work seeks to understand the uncertainties surrounding projections of future climate and the associated risks of climate change. I have an M.Sc. from Ruprecht-Karls-Universität Heidelberg and a B.Sc. from the University of Glasgow.
